mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_DISCHARGE_SUMMARY (PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, X_RAY_NO, COMPLICATION, DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT_RESULT, CREATE_TIME, CLINIC_DIAGNOSIS, ADMITTING_MAJOR_SYMPTOMS_AND_SIGNS, ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS, COURSE_AND_TREATMENT_RESULT, MAJOR_TEST_RESULT, SPECIAL_INSPECTION_AND_CONSULTATION, DISCHARGE_MAJOR_SYMPTOMS_AND_SIGNS, POST_DISCHARGE_MEDICATION_AND_SUGGESTION, POST_DISCHARGE_ORTHER_MEDICATION_AND_SUGGESTION ) values (#{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admittingDiagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xRayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dischargeDiagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dischargeDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatmentResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clinicDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{admittingMajorSymptomsAndSigns,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{admittingDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{courseAndTreatmentResult,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{majorTestResult,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{specialInspectionAndConsultation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dischargeMajorSymptomsAndSigns,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{postDischargeMedicationAndSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{postDischargeOrtherMedicationAndSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, X_RAY_NO, COMPLICATION, DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT_RESULT, CREATE_TIME, CLINIC_DIAGNOSIS, ADMITTING_MAJOR_SYMPTOMS_AND_SIGNS, ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS, COURSE_AND_TREATMENT_RESULT, MAJOR_TEST_RESULT, SPECIAL_INSPECTION_AND_CONSULTATION, DISCHARGE_MAJOR_SYMPTOMS_AND_SIGNS, POST_DISCHARGE_MEDICATION_AND_SUGGESTION, POST_DISCHARGE_ORTHER_MEDICATION_AND_SUGGESTION from V_HIS_DISCHARGE_SUMMARY
